NIOP-E, Sta. 792: Seychelles, St François atoll, W rim; 7°05'S 52°44'E; outer slope, depth ca. 25 m; scuba-diving; on holothurian (Stichopodidae), Thelenota ananas (Jaeger, 1833); 5/6.i.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 753: Seychelles, St Joseph atoll, NW rim; 5°24'S 53°19'E; reef slope; depth 10 m; scuba diving; on holothurian (Stichopodidae), Thelenota ananas (Jaeger, 1833); 26.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 723: Seychelles, Bird Island, off N coast; 3°42'S 55°12'E; coral reef, near drop-off, depth 16 m; scuba-diving; on one Acanthaster; 21.XII.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
Ternate
NIOP-E, Sta. 797: Seychelles, Platte Island atoll; 05°49'S 55°21'E; lagoon of inner atoll; depth 12 m; scuba diving; on Stichodactyla mertensii; 7.i.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 783: Seychelles, Ile Desnoeufs, Northern slope of platform;6°12'S 53°02'E; reef slope, depth: 12 m; scuba diving; on crinoid host; 2.I.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 767: Seychelles, Poivre atoll, N rim; 5°44'S 53°18'E; coral reef, depth: 15 m; scuba diving; on thread-like antipatharian host; 29/31.XII.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

ncrsCollector.abcd:GatheringAgent: H. ten Hove; NIOP-E, 'Tyro' Seychelles Expedition 1992/3

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: NIOP-E, Sta. 619: Seychelles, Mahé, NW coast, Beau Vallon; 04°37'S 55°26'E; rocky coast, bottom with patches of coral; depth 4-6 m; scuba diving; 14.xii.1992; in Pinctada margaritifera (+ 5 cm) pearl-oyster; collected by H. ten Hove.

NIOP-E, Sta. 609: Seychelles, Mahé, NW coast, Vista Do Mar; 04°34'S 55°26'E; depth 4 m, beach with beachrock and granitic boulders, sandy bottom at 4-9 m, scuba diving;11.xii.1992; pair in Pinctada margaritifera; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
Indonesia, Pulau Seribu (Thousand Islands), Pulau Tikus Tabir, sebalah barat; 25.i.1976; depth 2-3 m; collected by Isnuar & Tasori; collection PPPO Jakarta.
